title: Demining Sustainability Support to Ukraine
description: This project aims to help ensure the ongoing operation and effectiveness of a fleet of 12 remote-controlled demining systems provided by Canada to the State Emergency Service of Ukraine (SESU) in 2023. Project activities include: (1) providing 12 months of on-site technical support, training and mentorship for SESU personnel; and (2) providing a robust supply of additional spare parts for the demining systems.
